title: Man arrested after cousin shot while 2 were playing with gun
content:
SHREVEPORT, LA (KSLA) -
A 19-year-old Shreveport man spent Christmas in jail for allegedly shooting his cousin.
Jarrett Thigpen, of the 1900 block of Hickory Street, was arrested at 10:15 p.m. Dec. 24 then booked into Shreveport City Jail at 10:39 p.m. Dec. 24.
He is charged with 1 count of illegal use of a weapon.
Thigpen and his cousin were playing with a gun when the firearm went off, striking the cousin in the abdomen, according to City Jail booking records.
The cousin's name and the extent of the cousin's wound were not immediately available.
Thigpen remained in the City Jail the evening of Dec. 25.
